message: I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This offer won't be as good next round.
Come on, meet me in the middle!
This is my last offer above 50%. Take it or leave it!
You're running out of time, Bob!
Okay, let's be serious.  50/50. This is fair and avoids further losses for both of us.
Your 50/50 was too little, too late!
Time is running out for both of us. This is a compromise to avoid going home with nothing.
I'm not budging much, time is on my side!
